h1_title: How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss
h2_title: How to Summon the Shigandang Boss
content: The Shigandang will immediately charge the Stone Vanguard, prompting a Yaoguai King Boss Battle that you get to watch (though you're still susceptible to their massive earthquake attacks)!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Defeat_the_Stone_Vanguard_With_Another_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Summon the Shigandang Boss'.
The content is as follows:
The Shigandang will immediately charge the Stone Vanguard, prompting a Yaoguai King Boss Battle that you get to watch (though you're still susceptible to their massive earthquake attacks)!
